class_notes: As podcasting grows in popularity, communicators of all types can leverage this storytelling platform to produce content, whether as aspiring scientists, policymakers, science communicators, physicians, health professionals, or journalists. In this class, students will produce written and audio pieces suitable for publication and analyze current news stories and podcasts to better understand storytelling, reporting, writing, and creative approaches to podcast format and structure. Students will learn about developing a podcast script, conducting research and interviews, gathering quality audio, editing and sound design, and identifying a target audience for their content.
